    • Method Detail

      • getAllProjects

        public java.util.List<ProjectTuple> getAllProjects()
        Gets a list of tuples storing the project name and its ID number.
        Returns:
        A tuple list of all the projects in the database.

      • addProject

        public void addProject(Project inputProject)
        Searches the database for the given project. If it can't be found, it is added to the database.
        Parameters:
        inputProject - Project to add to the database.

      • getProject

        public Project getProject(ProjectTuple inputProject)
        Searches the database for a project and builds an object representing that project to load into memory.
        Parameters:
        inputProject - Project to search for, by name and ID.
        Returns:
        The project object from the database, or null if it doesn't exist.

      • getSampleImage

        public int getSampleImage(ProjectTuple inputProject)
        Chooses the batch ID we need to look for and returns that information to the DatabaseAccess
        Parameters:
        inputProject - Project to pull an image from.
        Returns:
        The int ID of the batch we want.

      • downloadBatch

        public int downloadBatch(ProjectTuple inputProject)
        Searches the given project for the batch ID of the batch we want, and changes the status of that batch to "incomplete".
        Parameters:
        inputProject - Project we're checking out a batch from.
        Returns:
        int representing the location we need to look for the batch we want.

      • submitBatch

        public boolean submitBatch(FinishedBatchWrapper doneBatch)
        Incoperates the information from the finished batch into the project.
        Parameters:
        doneBatch - batch to incorperate.
        Returns:
        true if operation succeeds, false otherwise
